title: Who sings the song hideaway? - Quora

response.answer_text: Kiesza and Daya were two artists who sang Hideaway. The latter having it as a debut single. She wrote it along with Leland Britten Newbill and Gino Barletta. Other artists include Karen O And The Kids, One Direction and David Sanborne.
